post_info.post_title: Should the second ammendment be extended to cover the bearing of gnomes?

I noticed she also had a rolling pin at the ready when police arrived. I think it's time for some regulation: Garden Gnomes are dangerous weapons!! :p

Garden Gnomes? Am I the only one who see's the evilness that dwells behind those beady little eyes? Gnomes should be outlawed for the sake of humanity, hell with the 2nd Amendment. I'd rather there be Light Anti-Tank Weapons in our homes than Gnomes on our lawns.
 
 I believe this fear of gnomes has something to do with an abduction by Alien Gnomes in my childhood. Ohhhhh, the probing, definately not pleasant. Fear all GNOMES!!!

The little stinkers are reproducing at a horrible rate. It's like an invasion. Once they have the numbers we'll be inundated and overcome.
 
 
 Fear the Gnomes.

The little stinkers are reproducing at a horrible rate. It's like an invasion. Once they have the numbers we'll be inundated and overcome.
 
 
 Fear the Gnomes.

 
 Going to Kmart or Wallmart, or any Garden Center sends chills down my spine. Never in all my years have I seen such determination to spread their evil throughout our land. They even have a SpokesGnome on TV now in those travel commericials, desensitizing us to the point where it is OK when they watch people having sex. What's next? Interspecies unions? When I have to go to these stores I have mentioned, I notice all Gnomes are on shelves at eye level. That's so they can put the evil Gnome Spell on you. emoticon_angry 
 
 First, you start out with one Gnome, and so do all your neighbors. However, next year, you buy a couple more, so do all your neighbors, and so on, until eventually, one night, you are sleeping, only to wake up with Gnome Boy wielding a Butcher Knife as he plunges it into your heart. emoticon_cry And the same thing is happening in all your neighbor's houses too. World conquest in one night. Be scared people, be very scared.
 
 Your right; Fear the Gnomes. emoticon_xkill

I don't have a problem with regular gnomes, but I think that military grade assault gnomes should be banned.
 I mean, do you really need a fully automatic gnome to defend your property?

I don't have a problem with regular gnomes, but I think that military grade assault gnomes should be banned.
 I mean, do you really need a fully automatic gnome to defend your property?

 
 emoticon_smile emoticon_smile emoticon_smile emoticon_smile

In my neighborhood, a full-auto stealth gnome defender would work pretty well, but I'm not sure I could trust the little sucker with all the warnings presented earlier. Well, the wife will be disappointed but it's for her own good.

Rumor has it that they all sneak in across the border from Canada.They work for peanuts, send all their money back to their families and expect everyone to learn Gnomish and give them drivers' licenses! I say we restart the minute-man project!
They must suffer terribly in the deep snows of the Canadian winter, eh? No wonder they're pouring south over the border. Little :xcensored ers.

You guys are all distracted!!! It's not the Gnomes we have to really worry about, I mean, heck their guarding the lawns and gardens we wouldn't want to anyway. And while we're arguing about these Gnomes, it's the Imps that are creeping over everyone's faces. 
 
 {impish grin} emoticon_rolleyes

You guys are all distracted!!! It's not the Gnomes we have to really worry about, I mean, heck their guarding the lawns and gardens we wouldn't want to anyway. And while we're arguing about these Gnomes, it's the Imps that are creeping over everyone's faces. 
 
 {impish grin} emoticon_rolleyes

 
 
 IMO they're in cahoots. Roast them all.

IMO they're in cahoots. Roast them all.

 
 
 You'll have to take that up with the Fairie Circle first.

I don't have a problem with regular gnomes, but I think that military grade assault gnomes should be banned.
 I mean, do you really need a fully automatic gnome to defend your property?

 
 
 Ummmm...
 
 I AND INVADER ZIM says YES!11!!
 
 But, of course, we desire to see the evil, loathsome humanz die horrible deaths (after they bow down to the glorious RUL of their superiors).
 
 So, yes, full automatic gnomes are NEEDED.
 To protect Zim while he plots and to protect me while I'm in my dank cave (aka basement) stroking my prescious.
 I know you'd like to stroke my prescious but you can't. It's MINE. And you'd have to find some cunning way to get past the gnomes (and other, unforclosed defenders) to get even close to it.
 
 
 'Yessss. My Pressssscciiooooussssssssss...' :p

ZARDOZ
 
 You keep Grr out of this!!! It's not his fault he's infatuated with TACOS!!!
